name: What Is Tirar Onda?
description:
This is a Jam game. It's unfinished and may contain bugs.

What Is Tirar Onda? (WITO) 

It's a cute game where you have to flirt with Miss. Piggy. "Tirar onda" a alguien is the equivalent to "To flirt with". Is a Shoot em' loink (love + oink) game.

You can use your keyboard (left arrow, right arrow and spacebar) or an Xbox controller.

This game was developed during "Global Game Jam Mendoza 2017".

Credits

Jafi Bravin - Programmer

Pepi Astorga - Graphic Designer

Never Gonna Give You Up (8 Bit Remix Cover Version) [Tribute to Rick Astley] - 8 Bit Universe
